original_text: So bring the people to me. They have eyes, but they are blind! They have ears, but they are deaf! So bring the people to me.
korean_text: 눈이 있어도 보지 못하고 귀가 있어도 듣지 못하는 백성을 이끌어 내라

sentences.original_text: So bring the people to me.
They have eyes, but they are blind!
They have ears, but they are deaf!
So bring the people to me.
